data.title: Grammy Winning Music Star Victory, On The Five Things You Need To Shine In The Music Industry
data.meta_description: Grammy Winning Music Star Victory, On The Five Things You Need To Shine In The Music Industry. … I would say it’s authentically applied love. What I mean by that is there’s a superficial kind of love where people do good things just….
data.text: … I would say it’s authentically applied love. What I mean by that is there’s a superficial kind of love where people do good things just to be seen as good, but genuine love goes beyond that. You can have authentic love but not apply it effectively. So, I think authentically applying love towards yourself, your neighbor, your audience, and even towards God will make you shine. As much as we use the phrase “love,” it’s still probably the most scarce thing. It’s in high demand because everybody needs it, but it’s the least demonstrated. If you have that genuine, authentically applied and expressed love, you’ll automatically stand out as one of those rare individuals in the world that people can go to and have their love deficits filled. That’s quite rare; there aren’t many people you can count on…
